name: sbom-ui-action
description: GitHub Action to generate and deploy interactive SBOM vulnerability dashboards

scripts.version:patch: npm run release v$(npm version patch --no-git-tag-version | sed 's/v//')
scripts.version:minor: npm run release v$(npm version minor --no-git-tag-version | sed 's/v//')
scripts.version:major: npm run release v$(npm version major --no-git-tag-version | sed 's/v//')
